title: CLEO Configuration Schema
description: Configuration for archive policies, validation rules, logging, and session behavior.

schemaVersion.description: Schema version for this file (semver). Canonical source for schema version (replaces root version field).

enabled.description: Enable automatic archiving of completed tasks.

daysUntilArchive.description: Days after completion before task is eligible for archive.

maxCompletedTasks.description: Max completed tasks in todo.json before triggering archive.

preserveRecentCount.description: Always keep this many recent completed tasks (for context).

archiveOnSessionEnd.description: Run archive check at session end.

autoArchiveOnComplete.description: Automatically archive completed task if eligible (age >= daysUntilArchive).

exemptLabels.description: Labels that exempt tasks from automatic archiving. Add these labels to any task/epic you want to protect from auto-archive.

daysUntilArchive.description: Days after completion before task with this label is eligible for archive.

neverArchive.description: If true, tasks with this label are never automatically archived.

relationshipSafety.description: Safety settings for archiving tasks with relationships.

preventOrphanChildren.description: Don't archive parent tasks with active children.

preventBrokenDependencies.description: Warn before archiving tasks that would break dependency chains.

cascadeArchive.description: Allow cascade archiving of completed children when parent is archived.

phases.description: Phase slugs that trigger archiving when completed.

archivePhaseOnly.description: Only archive tasks from the completed phase (vs all eligible tasks).

interactive.description: Interactive prompts and warnings for archive operations.

confirmBeforeArchive.description: Prompt for confirmation before archiving tasks.

showWarnings.description: Show warnings about relationships and dependencies before archiving.

checksumEnabled.description: Enable checksum verification. CRITICAL for anti-hallucination.

enforceAcceptance.description: Require acceptance criteria for high/critical tasks.

requireDescription.description: Require description field for all tasks.

maxActiveTasks.description: Maximum active tasks. Default 1. DO NOT CHANGE without good reason.

validateDependencies.description: Check all depends[] references exist and are valid.

enforcePhaseOrder.description: Warn when activating tasks outside current project phase.

phaseAdvanceThreshold.description: Percentage of tasks that must be completed to advance phase.

blockOnCriticalTasks.description: Prevent phase advancement if critical tasks remain incomplete.

warnPhaseContext.description: Show warning when task phase differs from project phase.

verification.description: Verification gates configuration for task quality tracking.

enabled.description: Enable verification gates for task completion. When true, parent auto-complete requires verification.passed = true.

maxRounds.description: Maximum implementation rounds before HITL escalation.

requiredGates.description: Gates required to pass for verification.passed = true. cleanupDone excluded by default.

autoSetImplementedOnComplete.description: Automatically set gates.implemented = true when ct complete runs.

requireForParentAutoComplete.description: Require verification.passed = true for parent auto-complete.

requireSession.description: Require an active session for task operations.

requireSessionNote.description: Warn if session ends without updating sessionNote.

warnOnNoFocus.description: Warn if no task is active at session start.

allowParallelAgents.description: Allow multiple agents to work concurrently.

autoStartSession.description: Automatically log session_start on first read.

showArchiveCount.description: Show archived task count in status output.

warnStaleDays.description: Warn about tasks pending longer than this.

defaultFormat.description: Default output format for list and export commands.

showColor.description: Enable ANSI color output. Respects NO_COLOR env var.

showUnicode.description: Use Unicode symbols and box-drawing characters.

showProgressBars.description: Show progress bars in dashboard and phase views.

csvDelimiter.description: Delimiter for CSV export (comma, tab, semicolon).

dateFormat.description: Date/time display format: iso8601, relative (5min ago), unix, locale.

showCompactTitles.description: Truncate long task titles in list view.

maxTitleLength.description: Maximum title length when showCompactTitles is enabled.

cli.description: CLI behavior, aliases, and plugin settings.

aliases.description: Command aliases mapping short names to commands.

directories.description: Directories to scan for plugins (in order of priority).

debug.description: Debug and validation settings for CLI.

enabled.description: Enable debug mode (verbose output, validation checks).

backup.description: Backup system configuration for snapshots, safety backups, incremental backups, and archive backups.

directory.description: Directory for storing all backup types (snapshot, safety, incremental, archive, migration).

maxSnapshots.description: Maximum number of snapshot backups to retain (count-based retention).

maxSafetyBackups.description: Maximum number of safety backups to retain (count-based retention, works with safetyRetentionDays).

maxIncremental.description: Maximum number of incremental backups to retain (count-based retention).

maxArchiveBackups.description: Maximum number of archive backups to retain (count-based retention).

safetyRetentionDays.description: Days to retain safety backups (time-based retention, works with maxSafetyBackups).

scheduled.description: Scheduled/automatic backup settings for session events and operations.

onSessionStart.description: Create snapshot backup when session starts.

onSessionEnd.description: Create safety backup when session ends.

onArchive.description: Create safety backup before archive operations.

intervalMinutes.description: Optional interval (minutes) for timed backups. 0 disables interval-based backups. When set, backups are created on CLI invocation if interval has elapsed since last backup.

cancellation.description: Configuration for task cancellation/deletion behavior. Safety-first defaults for automation.

cascadeConfirmThreshold.description: Prompt for confirmation when cascade operation affects more than N tasks. Covers typical epic sizes.

requireReason.description: Require --reason flag when cancelling tasks. Enforces accountability and audit trails.

daysUntilArchive.description: Days before cancelled tasks are automatically archived. 0 disables auto-archive.

allowCascade.description: Allow --children=cascade mode for parent tasks. When false, only block/orphan/fail modes permitted.

defaultChildStrategy.description: Default behavior for --children flag. block=prevent if has children, orphan=detach children, cascade=cancel children, fail=error.

hierarchy.description: Hierarchy constraints for Epic → Task → Subtask structure. LLM-Agent-First design: limits are organizational, not cognitive.

maxSiblings.description: Maximum children per parent (0 = unlimited, recommended for LLM agents). Done tasks excluded by default. See TASK-HIERARCHY-SPEC.md Part 3.2.

maxDepth.description: Maximum hierarchy depth (epic=0, task=1, subtask=2). Rarely needs changing.

countDoneInLimit.description: Whether done tasks count toward maxSiblings. Default false: done tasks are historical record, not active context.

maxActiveSiblings.description: Maximum active (non-done) children per parent. Aligns with TodoWrite sync limit for context management.

autoCompleteParent.description: Automatically complete parent tasks when all children are done.

autoCompleteMode.description: Auto-complete behavior: auto=silent completion, suggest=prompt user, off=disabled.

analyze.description: Configuration for the analyze command and task prioritization algorithms.

phaseBoost.description: Phase alignment boost multipliers for task prioritization. Tasks in the current project phase get higher priority.

current.description: Boost multiplier for tasks in current project phase.

adjacent.description: Boost multiplier for tasks in adjacent phases (order +/- 1).

distant.description: Boost multiplier for tasks in distant phases (order diff > 1).

sizeStrategy.description: Strategy for weighting tasks by size. quick-wins=favor small tasks, big-impact=favor large tasks, balanced=neutral.

sizeWeights.description: Custom weight multipliers by task size. Used when sizeStrategy is set to custom behavior or for fine-tuning.

staleDetection.description: Stale task detection settings for analyze command.

enabled.description: Enable stale task detection in analyze output.

pendingDays.description: Days before pending task is considered stale.

noUpdateDays.description: Days without notes/updates before task is stale.

blockedDays.description: Days blocked without progress before stale warning.

urgentNeglectedDays.description: Days high/critical priority task untouched before warning.

lockAwareness.description: Lock file detection and concurrent operation awareness settings.

enabled.description: Enable lock detection in analyze output.

staleThreshold.description: Seconds before a lock file is considered stale (default: 5 minutes).

warnOnly.description: Warn about locks but don't block operations. Set false to block on active locks.

multiSession.description: Multi-session concurrent agent configuration. Enables multiple LLM agents to work on different task groups simultaneously with isolated focus and scope boundaries.

enabled.description: Enable multi-session mode. When false, classic single-session behavior. When true, sessions.json is created and used.

maxActiveTasksPerScope.description: Maximum active tasks within a single session scope. Replaces global validation.maxActiveTasks.

scopeValidation.description: strict=error on scope overlap, warn=allow with warning, none=no validation.

allowNestedScopes.description: Allow session scopes that are subsets of other session scopes (e.g., taskGroup within epic).

allowScopeOverlap.description: Allow sessions with partially overlapping scopes. Risky but sometimes needed for collaborative work.

requireScopeOnStart.description: Require explicit scope when starting session. If false, defaults to full-project scope.

sessionTimeoutHours.description: Hours before a session is considered orphaned/stale.

autoSuspendOnTimeout.description: Automatically suspend sessions that exceed timeout instead of ending them.

historyRetentionDays.description: Days to retain ended sessions in sessionHistory before cleanup.

autoResumeLastSession.description: When starting without explicit session, auto-resume most recent suspended session for the scope.

trackSessionStats.description: Track session statistics (tasks completed, focus changes, active time).

backupOnSessionEvents.description: Create safety backup on session start/end/suspend events.

contextAlerts.description: Context window alert configuration. Controls when and how users are alerted about context window usage approaching thresholds.

enabled.description: Enable context window threshold alerts. When false, no alerts are shown.

minThreshold.description: Minimum threshold level to trigger alerts. warning=70%, caution=85%, critical=90%, emergency=95%.

triggerCommands.description: Commands that trigger context alert checks. Empty array = all commands.

suppressDuration.description: Seconds to suppress repeat alerts at same threshold level. 0 = show on every threshold crossing.

research.description: Subagent research output configuration. Controls where research outputs are stored and how they are managed.

outputDir.description: Directory for subagent research outputs relative to project root.

archiveDir.description: Subdirectory within outputDir for archived research.

archiveDays.description: Days until non-actionable research is archived.
